column5: Guys,  This heater is going on sale tomorrow at Canadian Tire. http://www.canadiantire.ca/AST/browse/5/SportsRec/1/Hunting/Heaters/PRD~0762117P/Coleman%252BSportcat%252BPropane%252BHeater.jsp?locale=en#BVRRWidgetID I have a 2 men pop-up shelter,which i would like to heat during gold days. How good is that heater? As i can see reviews are different on CT web site, maybe somebody is using it and can share own experience. thanks.
Hello  I have the Eskimo quick fish 3  i have that heater liked it at first but then i used a friends Mr Buddy Heater  I should have save my money and got the Mr Buddy Best of Luck
A waste of time, it would be like trying to heat Walmart with a candle.
Yes I have the model up from that which is 3000btu (yours is 1500btu) I think I'm returning mine to Costco lol
I use one in my clam 2000 hut, at -20 your going to want to pack a few hand and feet warmers.  One good thing about it, esp with kids in the hut. Theres no open flame.
